author: Andrea Mayes
title: Easter was not the same this year — but this might help if you're feeling lonely
description: Social-distancing measures mean we haven't been able to celebrate Easter like we normally would, and many of us are feeling lonelier than ever. The good news is, there are things you can do to stay connected.
content:
Posted 
April 13, 2020 12:10:16
It's no exaggeration to say Easter has been very different this year.
Traditionally it's a time for catching up with family and friends, going to church, enjoying lavish meals based on seafood and lamb, and perhaps an Easter… [+6682 chars]
